Text: Abe̩le̩ ma fʼabo Israe̩l du ko̩ nyʼo̩takada o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu; e̩ la go, ma che̩ko̩ nyʼibuku amonu Israe̩l; ma la mu Juda ño̩ nyi Babilo̩n todu ada ku ma je̩.
Oñ abo ku ma dabi dodo ewo ewo-ma chʼabo Israe̩l kpʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpai abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Juda kpʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin kpʼamo̩ma Ifraim kpai Ma-nasa ku ma gugu Je̩rusale̩m che
Utai o̩ma Amihud, o̩ma O̩mri, o̩ma Imrai, o̩ma Benai ef amo̩ma Pe̩re̩z, o̩ma Juda le̩.
E-abo Shailo̩n la che Asaya kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba kpʼamo̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Ze̩ra ku ma jʼef uma la che Jeue̩l, kpʼamo̩maye-ma, ulo̩gwa nyʼe̩le̩gwa.
Amo̩ma Be̩njamin ku ma jʼef uma la che Salu o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Ho̩dafaya, o̩ma Hase̩nua
kpai lbneaya, o̩ma Je̩roham kpʼEla o̩ma Uzai, o̩ma Mikrai kpai Me̩shulam o̩ma She̩fe̩taya o̩ma Reue̩l, o̩ma Ibna-ija;
kpʼamo̩maye-ma alu kʼo̩gba o̩gba-ma de̩, aluka one̩-wñ che icham nyʼoli me̩ta nyoke me̩fa. Abo-i chaka chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata-ma ef unyi amata-ma.
Abo ku ma dʼef amatama la che Je̩daya kpai Je̩ho̩yarib kpai Jekin,
kpʼAzaraya o̩ma Hilkaya, o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Zedo̩k o̩ma Me̩rayo̩t o̩ma Ahaitub kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba unyi o̩jo̩;
kpai Adaya o̩ma Je̩roham, o̩ma Pashur, o̩ma Malkija, kpai Maase̩e o̩ma Adie̩l, o̩ma Jaze̩ra, o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Me̩shile̩mit, o̩ma Ime̩r;
kpʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji chʼicham; ma chʼo̩je̩bi one̩ tod uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ef unyi O̩jo̩.
E-abo Lifai la che, She̩maya o̩ma Hashub, o̩ma Azraikam, o̩ma Hasha-baya, ef amo̩ma Me̩rari;
kpai Bakbakkar, Hire̩sh kpai Gelal kpai Matanaya o̩ma Maika, o̩ma Zikrai o̩ma Esaf,
kpai Obadaya o̩ma She̩maya, o̩ma Galal, o̩ma Je̩dutun kpai Be̩re̩kaya o̩ma Esa, o̩ma E̩lkana ku ma dodo adogbe adogbe abo Ne̩to̩fatai.
Abo ku ma de alo̩na che, Shalum kpai Akub, kpai Talmo̩n kpai Ahaiman kpʼamo̩maye-ma; Shalum chʼagboji.
Ama te̩tajo̩ alaku onu o̩wo̩ olodudu akwoubi; ama chʼama-dalo̩na ef uru amo̩ma Lifai.

Oñ Shalum o̩ma Ko̩re̩, o̩ma Ibaisaf, o̩ma Ko̩ra kpʼamo̩maye-wñ ef abo unyi ata-wñ. Abo Ko̩ra le̩ la nʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw O̩jo̩ ku ma dide o̩na o̩na unyabo; alu kʼamata-ma te̩te̩nʼo̩da uru Jihofa ku ma de alo̩na-wñ.
Oñ Fine̩has o̩ma E̩leaza chʼe̩nuto̩gba-ma akwoubi, Jihofa la dʼugbo-wñ.
Ze̩karaya o̩ma Me̩she̩le̩maya chʼe̩ne̩ ki ade o̩na unyabo ujeju.

Aluka abo-i chaka ku ma chi ku ma dide alo̩na alo̩na che o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwe-ji. Ma fʼabo le̩ lo likpa o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu ef adogbe adogbe-ma owñ chʼabo ku Defid kpai Samiue̩l, agane̩ le̩, ko jo̩ ugugu abo ku ma chubi one̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ama kpʼamo̩ma-ma nʼedejutʼalaku alaku unyi Jihofa, owñ chʼunyi unyabo kʼama ki dide o̩mo̩,
Ama-de alo̩na alo̩na jo̩ o̩wo̩ afu me̩le̩, o̩wo̩ olodudu kpʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Oñ i dukpe̩ kʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma jo̩ adogbe adogbe-ma, ki wa o̩jo̩ mebie o̩jo̩ mebie ikoʼka ikoʼka ku ma jʼugbo ma:
todu amade alo̩na me̩le̩ ki tʼo̩gba ku ma chʼabo Lifai, ugugu-ma chʼugugu abo ku ma ke̩do̩no ma, ama la nʼo̩da unyi kekele unyi kekele kpʼe̩wñ akokokijʼef unyi O̩jo̩.
Todu ama le̩ ruru jo̩ lʼunyi O̩jo̩ daka, todabu kʼama nʼudu e̩wñ le̩ ede, ama nʼo̩na-wñ ebi odudu o̩jo̩ du.
Oñ abo-ma iche̩ka nʼedejute̩ e̩wñ eku ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ unyi O̩jo̩ le̩. Todu ekaluka ma kʼe̩wñ le̩ aluka taku ma kowa ejefu, oñ ma ño̩ kaluka taku ma ko dufu.
Abo-ma iche̩ka ño̩ nʼo̩da ane̩ efu-wñ; kpʼe̩wñ eku kiafo̩ le̩ chaka, kpʼomu-wñ te̩ke̩ te̩ke̩ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpʼekpo-wñ, kpai frankinse̩ns-wñ, kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩.
Oñ amo̩ma amatama iche̩ka añwʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ che ki ñwo̩.
Oñ ma ke̩do̩no Matitaiya, e̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba Shalum e̩ne̩ Ko̩ra, kʼi dejutʼe̩wñ ku ma de̩ ef anade.
Oñ amo̩maye-ma iche̩ka, ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Kohat nʼo̩da akala ku ma te̩jo̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ uñmi du.
Amakeli la jo̩-i: ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata abo Lifai, ku ma jʼef unyi kekele unyi kekele le̩, ku ma ma nʼe̩wñ omune̩ ache n; todu ma jʼef uko̩lo̩-ma o̩ro̩ka kpʼodu.
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata ef abo Lifai ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma ku ma chʼabo ki tʼo̩gba. Abo-i la gugu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ Jeie̩l, ata Gibeo̩n, gugu Gibeo̩n, odu o̩ya-wñ ko̩ Maaka:
Abdo̩n la chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ, tak i bi Zur kpai Kish kpai Beal kpai Ne̩r kpai Nedab
kpai Gedor kpai Ahayo kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Miklot.
Miklot la bi She̩me̩am. Ama laño̩ dodo kpenyʼamo̩maye-ma Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamo̩maye-ma.
Ne̩r la bi Kish; Kish la bi So̩l; So̩l la bi Jonatan kpai Malkishua kpai Abinadab kpai E̩sh-beal.
O̩ma Jonatan la che Me̩ribeal; Me̩ribeal la bi Maika
Amo̩ma Maika la che Paito̩n kpai Mile̩k kpai Tarea kpai Ehaz.
Oñ Ehaz bi Jara: Jara la bi Ale̩me̩t, kpʼAzmefe̩t, kpai Zimrai; Zimrai la bi Moza;
Moza la bi Baine̩a; kpai Re̩faya o̩ma-wñ; E̩liaza o̩ma-wñ, Eze̩l o̩ma-wñ.
Eze̩l la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩fa kʼodu-ma ko̩, Azraikam kpai Boke̩ru kpai Ishmae̩l kpai Shiaraya kpai Obadaya kpai Henan; abo-i chʼamo̩ma Eze̩l.
